testcase.name: when scheduled time (hour) is greater than current time (hour), day is today()
when scheduled time (hour) is equal to current time (hour), scheduled time (minutes) are less than current time (minutes), day is tomorrow()
when scheduled time (hour) is equal to current time (hour), scheduled time (minutes) are greater than current time (minutes), day is today()
when scheduled time (hour) is less than current time (hour), day is tomorrow()
